events.name: LIBs supply chain
events.wd_description: Multiple companies from several countries participate in the LIBs supply chain.
events.description: Multiple companies from several countries participate in the LIBs supply chain.

events.name: Indonesia's production
events.wd_description: If all three are able to operate according to the planned capacity, Indonesia's production is equivalent to 50% of global MHP/MSP production capacity and 6.8% class 1 nickel.
events.description: If all three are able to operate according to the planned capacity, Indonesia's production is equivalent to 50% of global MHP/MSP production capacity and 6.8% class 1 nickel.

events.name: Number of operating nickel smelters
events.wd_description: The number of operating nickel smelters was 2 before the first export ban in 2014, 13 in 2020, and should more than double to 30 through 2023.
events.description: The number of operating nickel smelters was 2 before the first export ban in 2014, 13 in 2020, and should more than double to 30 through 2023.

events.name: Ministry's plans
events.wd_description: However, the ministry's plans have been revised before, and could prove to be too ambitious.
